name: Paper Hell
description:
Escape the teacher's grasp by completing quizzes on the desk and faster than the teacher can provide (yes, the game is winnable).  The supply of work never ends otherwise.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 47 with the theme being Stuck in a Loop. I haven't had time to implement a full screen option yet, so I hope window mode will suffice.

Controls:
Escape: Quits to Main Menu, or quits game.
Left Mouse Button: Start game & select answer.

Programming, Art, Sound & Music made by Lexyvil (Alexandre Laframboise)
Art by Lurondo

Version v1.1 and onwards are post-game-jam.

Made in C#/Monogame.
